page.title: 07Employment Survey in Windsor
page.content: We are not allowed to ride our bikes to school because of heavy traffic. Dedworth is only two miles from the M4 so we carried out an employment survey to find out what kinds of jobs our parents have and how far they travel. 178 families replied to our survey and we discovered that 317 parents have jobs. There was only one home where no one worked because both parents were disabled. We were interested in the kinds of jobs our parents did and divided them into 3 groups. Our results showed: 1) Only 0.6% of parents were employed in{Primary Industry}where people are producing raw materials e.g. farming, mining. 2) 7.6% were employed in{Secondary {Industry,}which is manufacturing a product.
